content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 2446
August 9, 2
MEMORANDUM
To : Mr. R. L. Hirsh berg, Program Officer, US AID/C
Original signed by
From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies of SDC letter SDC-5515 dated August 4, 1962 and MK) letter MX-1585 dated August 3, 1962.
In the above letter, SDC requested that lathe, drilling machines and hack saw be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan. Pertinent Reports of Excess Equipment are also attached herewith.
Encl. Reports Copies of SDC/MKA letters
cc: (with copies of SDC/MKA letters) SDC BES 2D CS/psh
E- 16.13.2
(2) 213 Academia Historica
51. 3. 100×200
47

paragraphs.content: To : Mr. R. L. Hirsh berg, Program Officer, US AID/C
From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX (99-471)
Reference is made to the attached copies of SDC letter SDC-5515 dated August 4, 1962 and MK) letter MX-1585 dated August 3, 1962.

In the above letter, SDC requested that lathe, drilling machines and hack saw be procured. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan. Pertinent Reports of Excess Equipment are also attached herewith.
Encl. Reports Copies of SDC/MKA letters
cc: (with copies of SDC/MKA letters) SDC BES 2D CS/psh
